Hens on a warpath The Occidental Tigers look more like house cats in a  sweep PERIOD Ever since the hard loss to CMS in the Sixth Street Rivalry PP has rallied tallying up five straight wins and making a run for contention in conference PERIOD

Kingsmen tried to rein but the Sagehens had other ideas PERIOD The PomonaPitzer PP mens water polo team took Cal Lutheran for a watery ride on Oct  sinking the Kingsmens dreams of victory with a decisive  victory PERIOD

Dominating through the decades This Stag sweep marks the nineteenth consecutive sixthstreet loss for the sagehens volleyball team history PERIOD With five consecutive SCIAC section championships a cast of killers and zero sets dropped in league play so far this season the Athenas are flawless PERIOD The Sagehens made it competitive but they couldnt stand with the champs PERIOD
